explains: vt. 剪烛花；掐灭；消灭；嗅出
wordGroup: snuff out 扼杀；消灭；死掉
up to snuff 精明的；状况良好的；正常的

sentences.en: Revenue from snuff, sold under brands from Sweden's General to Timber Wolf in the U. S., gained 20 percent to 953 million kronor.
sentences.cn: 来自鼻烟的收入，从瑞典的将军品牌到美国的大灰狼品牌所出售的，增长了20%，达到了9.53亿克朗。

sentences.en: One of these involved the anatomical snuff box.
sentences.cn: 其中一个就涉及鼻烟窝。

sentences.en: When he was pleased with himself, he permitted himself a pinch of snuff.
sentences.cn: 得意的时候他只闻一点鼻烟。
